```{r}
#| message: false
resources <- readr::read_csv("Data/resources.csv") |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    Link = kableExtra::cell_spec(
      stringr::str_remove_all(Link, "https://|/$"),
      format = "html",
      link = Link
    )
  )
```


# Blogs

```{r}
resources |>
  dplyr::filter(Type == "Blog") |>
  dplyr::select(-Type) |>
  knitr::kable("html", escape = FALSE)
```
